thought: The first step is to open the 'Language' menu. I will move the mouse to the 'Language' menu and click it.
The next step according to the bug report is 'Define your language...'. I need to find this option in the currently opened 'Language' menu and click it.
The next step is to click on the 'Styler' button in the 'User Define Language' window. I will move the mouse to the 'Styler' button and click it.

Now that the 'Styler Dialog' is open, I need to type something into either the 'Name' or 'Size' field, and then hit enter. I will start with the 'Name' field. First, I need to move the mouse to the 'Name' field.
Now that I've clicked the 'Name' field, I need to paste some text into it. I will paste the word 'test' into the field.
Now that I've pasted the text 'test' into the 'Name' field, the next step is to hit the 'Enter' key, as per the bug report. This should trigger the crash.
